title.rendered: We are serving you at new airports

content.rendered:
At Maple Parking Parking, we’ve been the leading low cost meet and greet Airport parking operator in the UK for many years. Providing our airport parking services exclusively at Gatwick initially, our success and business has grown substantially, and we are happy to announce that we are offering our meet and greet airport parking at 7 of the busiest airports across the UK. You can now park your car safely and securely with us at Gatwick, Heathrow, Stansted, Southend, Southampton, Birmingham and Edinburgh airports.

If you have used Maple Parking Parking before at Gatwick, you’ll know that there is no easier, safer, more convenient and cost effective way to park your car at the Airport, using our meet and greet service. If you perhaps live nearer to the other airports, have used other parking methods at Gatwick, or have never thought to park at the airport before; we’ll let you know why parking with Maple Parking Parking could save you time, money and stress.

If you’re not familiar with who we are, here’s a brief outline of what you can expect from Maple Parking Parking at your airport.

  • The easiest and most convenient way to park at the airport
  • Safe and extremely secure airport parking in monitored car parks
  • Airport parking official approved operator
  • Fully insured, uniformed, ID checked staff
  • Secure online booking / live instant quotes
  • Competitive prices with a price match promise

The meet and greet service is simple and easy for our customers;

  • Book online by telling us what date / time you arrive and depart.
  • Arrive at the departure terminal in your car and meet our professional representative, who’ll conduct a quick check of your car, and then take it to our super secure car parks for you.
  • You are now free to simply walk into departures with your luggage, no stress.
  • One call when you land, and your driver will bring your car to the terminal to meet you.

We take the stress out of airport parking, the very best start to your travel, be it for business or pleasure. Our procedures are thoroughly and constantly checked, updated and adhered to, and our staff are highly trained so we can offer the most professional service to you at all times.

We expanded to other airports as we saw demand for easier parking methods, and felt that our particular meet and greet parking service would be extremely well received at the airports we’ve chosen. We’ll take a look at them all and explain why Maple Parking Parking meet and greet is working all over the UK.

Maple Parking Parking at Birmingham Airport

  • Parking at Birmingham Airport itself can vary from around £20 – £40 per day, all depending on how far you are willing to walk / take a bus to your car! Of course if you plan to travel for a few days, this can work out costly.
  • Birmingham Airport is situated just off the M42 and can be accessed via the M6, M40 or M1. If you’re local, you’ll know that traffic on these motorways is renowned for being bad, so getting a cab to the airport could work out to be much more expensive than parking your own car if you get stuck in traffic!
  • Our parking at Birmingham is proving extremely popular with families who prefer to drive their own car to the airport to make it easier for their little ones.
  • Getting public transport to Birmingham airport could be highly stressful and not worthwhile, especially if you have children or anyone in need of assistance for example, wheelchair user.
  • We continually check Birmingham airport parking prices, to ensure that you get the best parking deal and price, and we know that meeting our drivers right outside your terminal, is the most stress free way to start your journey.

Maple Parking Parking at Heathrow Airport

  • As the biggest and one of the busiest airports, parking at Heathrow can be tricky, and work out up to £60 per day!
  • Getting a cab to Heathrow Airport from even a short distance can also work out expensive, especially if it’s a black cab and you get stuck in the Heathrow traffic.
  • Heathrow itself is huge, and parking around it will mean walking or getting a bus with all your luggage.
  • Our meet and greet parking at Heathrow has been extremely successful and popular so far, as we offer one of the most competitive meet and greet airport parking option at Heathrow. Check our prices and price match promise.
  • Our customers at Heathrow range from business professionals, families, groups and disabled customers, all using Maple Parking Parking.

Maple Parking Parking at Edinburgh

  • Our Edinburgh airport parking customers are mainly families and the disabled or elderly. Meet and Greet parking is far more convenient for them, and cheaper than most of the other parking / travel options.
  • Parking on site at Edinburgh Airport could cost you anything up to around £40 per day.
  • We saw a huge influx of business in the winter months up in Edinburgh. We can only assume that the cold weather made our customers more inclined to drive their own warm car from their drive to the terminal, rather than be let down by public transport whilst the weather was against them.

Maple Parking Parking at Southampton Airport

  • Even at Southampton Airport, which is a relatively smaller airport, on site airport parking close to the airport costs around £36 per day.
  • We have been kept really busy down here at Southampton Airport, with our custom mainly coming from the senior clients and families. Due to less traffic around the airport, it’s really easy to just jump in your own family car with your luggage and children, meet us outside departures, and let us take care of the rest.
  • Meet and greet parking at Southampton Airport has really taken off. If you are flying from there soon, give us a try!

Maple Parking Parking at Southend Airport

  • Sitting on the outskirts of London, Southend airport is still very busy and many people, especially those flying for business are choosing to drive to, and fly from here.
  • It’s easier for many people to drive to Southend Airport rather than the other London Airports and it’s also in close proximity to eastern towns and cities of the UK.
  • We have many business clients at Southend Airport, who wanted to keep their car safe whilst away and not pay London parking prices! We also get many families as always.
  • Onsite parking at Southend Airport is anything from £15-£25 a day.

Maple Parking Parking at Stansted Airport

  • Like the other bigger, busier airports, we have customers of all ages and all types of traveller using our meet and greet parking at Stansted.
  • Parking options at Stansted can be expensive, and you have to take care when booking offsite parking / transfers / shuttles etc.

We hope to expand further to other Airports around the UK soon such as Glasgow, Manchester, Leeds and more, to offer everyone travelling out of the UK; the most convenient, cheapest way to park at the airport. If you would like any more information about Maple Parking Parking at an airport near you, please do get in touch.
